value.title: 8 Types of Environments in AI
value.content:
Just as you wouldn’t teach a child to ride a bike on a busy highway, AI agents need controlled environments to learn and improve. The environment shapes how an agent perceives the world, learns from experience, and makes decisions, whether it’s a self-driving car or a chatbot. Understanding these environments is essential to building AI […]
The post 8 Types of Environments in AI appeared first on Analytics Vidhya.
